containermanagerd_system(8) System Manager's Manual containermanagerd_system(8)

NAME

containermanagerd_system — System container directory management daemon

SYNOPSIS

containermanagerd_system

DESCRIPTION

containermanagerd_system creates, destroys, and otherwise manages system containers for application bundles used by appinstalld(8).
It is a classic launch daemon managed by launchd(8).

Users should not run containermanagerd_system manually and changing arguments is unsupported.

FILES

  • /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.containermanagerd_system.plist
  • /usr/libexec/containermanagerd_system
  • /private/var/root/Library/ContainerManager/System
  • /private/var/root/Library/Caches/com.apple.containermanagerd/System
  • /private/var/containers

SEE ALSO

appinstalld(8), launchd(8)

HISTORY

containermanagerd_system was first introduced in macOS 13 and first used in macOS 14.

March 20, 2023 Darwin
